018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.lang.System.getProperty;
022import static java.lang.System.out;
023import static java.util.Objects.nonNull;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.Common.initHelperTaglets;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.EMPTY_STRING;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.isEmptyOrBlank;
028
029import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
030import java.io.BufferedReader;
031import java.io.File;
032import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
033import java.io.FileReader;
034import java.io.IOException;
035import java.util.EnumSet;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Set;
038
039import org.apiguardian.api.API;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.JavadocError;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
042import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
043import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Doclet;
044import jdk.javadoc.doclet.DocletEnvironment;
045import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet;
046
047/**
048 *  <p>{@summary With this taglet, it is possible to add a list of open points
049 *  to the <i>documentation</i> of a module or a package.} The parameter of the
050 *  tag is the (absolute) path to a simple text file; this path will be
051 *  combined with the path provided by the
052 *  {@linkplain System#getProperty(String, String) system property}
053 *  {@value #PROPERTY_TODO_BASE}
054 *  (if any).</p>
055 *  <p>In the file, each open point consists of a sequence of lines that will
056 *  end with an empty line. HTML tags are taken as they are, JavaDoc tags are
057 *  not interpreted.</p>
058 *  <p>So the {@code module-info.java} file for a project may look like
059 *  this:</p>
060 *  <pre><code> &#47;**
061 *  * &hellip;
062 *  *
063 *  * &#64;todo /task.list
064 *  *&#47;
065 *  module my.module
066 *  {
067 *      requires java.base;
068 *      requires &hellip;
069 *
070 *      exports &hellip;
071 *  }</code></pre>
072 *  <p>With {@value #PROPERTY_TODO_BASE} set to
073 *  &quot;{@code /home/programmer/project/}&quot;, the file will be searched at
074 *  &quot;{@code /home/programmer/project/task.list}&quot;.</p>
075 *  <p>Given the contents of that file looks like this:</p>
076 *  <pre><code>  Cleanup the class comments
077 *
078 *  Re-think the parser implementation</code></pre>
079 *  <p>the generated Module description will look like this:</p>
080 *  <table border="1">
081 *    <caption>Sample JavaDoc output</caption>
082 *    <tr>
083 *      <td>
084 *        <div class="header">
085 *          <h2 class="title">Module&nbsp;my.module</h2>
086 *        </div>
087 *        <div class="contentContainer">
088 *          <div class="block">&hellip;</div>
089 *          <dl>
090 *            <dt>
091 *              <span class="simpleTagLabel">Open Issues (The <i>ToDo</i>
092 *                List):</span>
093 *            </dt>
094 *            <dd>
095 *              <ul>
096 *                <li>Cleanup the class comments</li>
097 *                <li>Re-think the parser implementation</li>
098 *              </ul>
099 *            </dd>
100 *          </dl>
101 *          <div class="block">&hellip;</div>
102 *        </div>
103 *      </td>
104 *    <tr>
105 *  </table>
106 *
107 *  <p>With Maven or Gradle, the base path can be easily set to the project
108 *  root.</p>
109 *
110 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
111 *  @version $Id: ToDoTaglet.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $
112 *  @since 0.0.5
113 */
114@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ToDoTaglet.java 977 2022-01-06 11:41:03Z tquadrat $" )
115@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
116public final class ToDoTaglet implements Taglet
117{
118        /*-----------*\
119    ====** Constants **========================================================
120        \*-----------*/
121    /**
122     *  The name of the property that holds the base path for the todo list:
123     *  {@value}. It will be set on the {@code javadoc} command line like this:
124     *  &quot;<code>-J-Dorg.tquadrat.foundation.todo.base=&hellip;</code>&quot;
125     */
126    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
127    public static final String PROPERTY_TODO_BASE = "org.tquadrat.foundation.todo.base";
128
129    /**
130     *  The name of this taglet: {@value}.
131     */
132    public static final String TAGLET_NAME = "todo";
133
134        /*------------*\
135    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
136        \*------------*/
137    /**
138     *  The base path for the todo file.
139     */
140    private File m_BasePath;
141
142    /**
143     *  The doclet.
144     */
145    @SuppressWarnings( {"unused", "FieldCanBeLocal"} )
146    private Doclet m_Doclet;
147
148    /**
149     *  The doclet environment.
150     */
151    @SuppressWarnings( {"unused", "FieldCanBeLocal"} )
152    private DocletEnvironment m_DocletEnvironment;
153
154        /*--------------*\
155    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
156        \*--------------*/
157    /**
158     *  Creates a new {@code ToDoTaglet} instance.
159     */
160    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantNoArgConstructor" )
161    public ToDoTaglet() { /* Just exists */ }
162
163        /*---------*\
164    ====** Methods **==========================================================
165        \*---------*/
166    /**
167     *  {@inheritDoc}
168     */
169    @Override
170    public final Set<Location> getAllowedLocations() { return EnumSet.of( Location.MODULE, Location.PACKAGE ); }
171
172    /**
173     *  {@inheritDoc}
174     */
175    @Override
176    public final String getName() { return TAGLET_NAME; }
177
178    /**
179     *  {@inheritDoc}
180     */
181    @Override
182    public final void init( final DocletEnvironment docletEnvironment, final Doclet doclet )
183    {
184        Taglet.super.init( docletEnvironment, doclet );
185        m_Doclet = doclet;
186        m_DocletEnvironment = docletEnvironment;
187        initHelperTaglets( docletEnvironment, doclet );
188        m_BasePath = new File( getProperty( PROPERTY_TODO_BASE, "/" ) );
189    }   //  init()
190
191    /**
192     *  {@inheritDoc}
193     */
194    @Override
195    public final boolean isInlineTag() { return false; }
196
197    /**
198     *  Processes the given file and adds its contents to the provided
199     *  {@link StringBuilder}.<br>
200     *  <br>Each todo entry will be added as a {@code <li>} item.
201     *
202     *  @param  file    The file with the todo list.
203     *  @param  buffer  The destination for the output.
204     */
205    private static final void processFile( final File file, final StringBuilder buffer )
206    {
207        try( final var reader = new BufferedReader( new FileReader( file ) ) )
208        {
209            var line = EMPTY_STRING;
210            var isLIOpen = false;
211            ReadLineLoop: while( nonNull( line ) )
212            {
213                line = reader.readLine();
214                if( isEmptyOrBlank( line ) )
215                {
216                    if( isLIOpen ) buffer.append( "</li>" );
217                    isLIOpen = false;
218                }
219                else
220                {
221                    //---* Skip comments *-------------------------------------
222                    if( line.startsWith( "#" ) ) continue ReadLineLoop;
223
224                    //---* Add the task description *--------------------------
225                    buffer.append( isLIOpen ? " " : "\n<li>" );
226                    isLIOpen = true;
227                    buffer.append( line );
228                }
229            }   //  ReadLineLoop:
230        }
231        catch( final FileNotFoundException e )
232        {
233            //---* Should not happen … *---------------------------------------
234            throw new JavadocError( format( "File '%s' does not exist", file.getName() ), e );
235        }
236        catch( final IOException e )
237        {
238            throw new JavadocError( format( "Problems on processing '%s'", file.getAbsolutePath() ), e );
239        }
240    }   //  processFile()
241
242    /**
243     *  {@inheritDoc}
244     */
245    @SuppressWarnings( "resource" )
246    @Override
247    public final String toString( final List<? extends DocTree> tags, final Element element )
248    {
249        final var prefixLen = getName().length() + 1;
250
251        var retValue = EMPTY_STRING;
252        final var buffer = new StringBuilder();
253        tags.stream()
254            .map( Object::toString )
255            .map( t -> t.substring( prefixLen ).trim() )
256            .map( t -> new File( m_BasePath, t ) )
257            .filter( file ->
258            {
259                if( file.exists() ) return true;
260                out.printf( "Todo List '%s' not found%n", file.getAbsolutePath() );
261                return false;
262            } )
263            .forEach( file -> processFile( file, buffer ) );
264
265        if( !buffer.isEmpty() )
266        {
267            final var template =
268                """
269
270                <dt><span class="simpleTagLabel">Open Issues (The <i>ToDo</i> List):</span></dt>
271                <dd>
272                  <ul>
273                   %s
274                 </ul>
275                </dd>
276                """;
277
278            retValue = format( template, buffer );
279        }
280
281        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
282        return retValue;
283    }   //  toString()
284}
285//  class ToDoTaglet
286
287/*
288 *  End of File
289 */
